Package org.cougaar.lib.web.micro.base

This package contains the Cougaar "micro" servlet engine, which is a minimal implementation of the "javax.servlet" framework APIs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ClientFactory A factory for client-side (outgoing) connections.
Connection A generic, socket-like connection API.
RequestCallback A data reader for the HttpServletRequestImpl class.
ResponseCallback A data writer for the HttpServletResponseImpl class.
ServerFactory A factory for server-side (listening) connections.
ServerFactory.AcceptCallback  
ServerFactory.ListenerControl  
ServletEngine A minimal servlet engine API.
 

Class Summary
AnnotatedInputStream A marker class for a ServletInputStream that contains embedded "noop" and "flush" commands.
AnnotatedOutputStream A marker class for a ServletOutputStream that contains an embedded AnnotatedOutputStream.done() command.
HttpServletRequestImpl An implementation of the http-servlet-request interface.
HttpServletResponseImpl An implementation of the http-servlet-response interface.
RequestCallbackImpl A standard request callback implementation that reads from an InputStream.
ResponseCallbackImpl A standard implementation of the ResponseCallback API.
ServletConfigImpl A standard implementation of the ServletConfig API.
ServletContextImpl A minimal servlet context implementation.
ServletEngineImpl A servlet engine backed by our ServerFactory support.
ServletTunnel A utility class to tunnel servlet requests through a client Connection.
SnoopServlet This servlet is a minimal test servlet for server debugging.
SocketClientFactory A standard Socket-based client connection factory implementation.
SocketServerFactory A standard ServerSocket-based server connection factory implementation.
 

Package org.cougaar.lib.web.micro.base Description

This package contains the Cougaar "micro" servlet engine, which is a minimal implementation of the "javax.servlet" framework APIs.

The engine uses a ServerFactory to listen for incoming connections. The API has been designed to support both socket and non-socket backends.

Also of interest is the ServletTunnel, which is a utility class for tunnelling servlet requests through a generic connection API.

Note that this package only depends upon the JDK and Servlet APIs. There are no Cougaar dependencies.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
